sentences.en: ...a spirit of forgiveness and national reconciliation.
sentences.cn: …一种宽恕与民族和解的精神。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He admitted he had done her wrong and asked for forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 他承认曾经冤枉她,并且请求原谅.
他恳求他的双亲宽恕他.

sentences.en: He begged her forgiveness for his mistake.
sentences.cn: 他请求她谅解他的错误.

sentences.en: He implored forgiveness for what he had done.
sentences.cn: 他乞求宽恕他过去所做的事.

sentences.en: He threw himself at her feet and asked her forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 他匍匐在她脚下,乞求她原谅他.

sentences.en: I feel constrained to write and ask for your forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 我不得不写信请你原谅.

sentences.en: I offered up a short prayer for forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 我做了个简短的祷告，祈求宽恕。

sentences.en: It was an incredible display of motherly love and forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 那是慈母般关爱与宽容的了不起的表现。

sentences.en: Jolyon could see that Irene was deeply affected by this simple forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 乔里恩可以看出伊琳被这样单纯的饶恕深深打动了.

sentences.en: She preached to the congregation about forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 她向会众宣讲宽恕的道理。

sentences.en: The thief sought forgiveness for his guilty acts.
sentences.cn: 那小偷乞求宽恕他的罪行.

sentences.en: They dropped to their knees and begged forgiveness.
